A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Tried too hard for laughs.   If I wanted jokes\, I'd watch Spaceballs. Killing Snoke with no explanation of who he is? Captain Phasma getting less screen time than Porgs? Rey and Kylo \"force skyping\" Rey's parents are \"nobodies\"\, and Luke Skywalker giving up because  things got hard?     I am done with Star Wars.   Done.
